title: YASUO NEEDS A NERF
body: CAN SOMEONE PLEASE FIX YASUO HE IS BEYOND UNBALANCED FOR NEW PLAYERS TO THE GAME HOW DOES RIOT INTEND ON BRINGING ON NEW PLAYERS AND GETTING THEM TO STAY ON THE GAME WHEN THEY HAVE  YASUO WHO IS UNBALANCED CHAMPION TO SAY THE LEAST

replies.body: Yasuo currently has a 47.27% in Master+ ELO. But he has a 53.11% winrate in Bronze. I wouldn't say he needs a nerf, but he is definitely dis-proportionally strong against newer players.

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zQAmqNyA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-19T13:46:35.190+0000)
>
> Yasuo currently has a 47.27% in Master+ ELO. But he has a 53.11% winrate in Bronze. I wouldn't say he needs a nerf, but he is definitely dis-proportionally strong against newer players.

im not refering to ranked in the game im refering to learning the game in blind pick especially
